assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures performed in studies involving human participants were in accordance with the ethical standards of the University of Iowa Institutional Review Board and the Shinshu University Ethical Committee, and with the 1964 Helsinki declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.
